It seems that the neon energy is the key to much new technologies, so I created a module to improve my Researcher. It allows me to do more researches using this type of energy.
The Module must be directly connected to the Researcher that means that all work is done in the Researcher as usual.
The module stores up to 10000 NE, if this not enough for a research you can use more modules or wait until its fills up again. The energy can be inserted by cables or batteries.
